text: Fight Club is a novel by Chuck Palahniuk. It was published in 1996 by W. W. Norton & Company. It was well received. The story is about an insomniac and a man named Tyler Durden. They start a fight club as a form of mental therapy. The book was made into a movie of the same name starring Brad Pitt and Edward Norton. Category:1996 books Category:20th-century American novels Category:Dissociative identity disorder in fiction
title: Fight Club (novel)
